name: Lucid Dream
description: Lucid Dream is a dynamic blend of Amnesia Haze and Blue Dream. This sativa-dominant hybrid provides a stimulating mix of uplifting Haze effects with the sweet blueberry notes of Blue Dream. Lucid Dream's energetic, uplifting buzz makes it a great daytime choice for patients treating migraines, nausea, and stress.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Energetic, Giggly, Happy, Uplifted, Stress, Depression, Fatigue, Lack of Appetite, Nausea, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Anxious, Paranoid
